metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12420 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Apache SpamAssassin before 3.4.3, a message can be crafted in a way touse excessive resources. Upgrading to SA 3.4.3 as soon as possible is therecommended fix but details will not be shared publicly.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sa-compile - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
spamassassin - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
spamc - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spamassassin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
